package.name: KACI-Parental_Control
package.descr: Keekar's Parental Control - Advanced time-based access control and content filtering for children's devices. Manage screen time, set daily/weekly limits, and block access during specific hours.
package.after_install_info:
=============================================== Keekar's Parental Control Package Installed Successfully! ===============================================
To configure Keekar's Parental Control: 1. Go to Services > Keekar's Parental Control 2. Enable the service 3. Add child devices (by MAC address or IP) 4. Set time limits and schedules 5. Configure content categories to block
Features: - Time-based access control (daily/weekly limits) - Schedule-based blocking (bedtime, homework time) - Device management by MAC address - Integration with pfSense firewall rules - Real-time usage monitoring - Dashboard widget for quick overview
Documentation: Services > Parental Control > Help
Note: Firewall rules will be automatically created and managed. Changes take effect immediately.
